title: Ash
description: ***Comprehensible Jamaican dialect is used throughout the story because the heroine 'Zel' is half Jamaican***Asher finds out his whole life was a facade. Everything he thought he knew and the life he had come to know; all lies. Now he'll know who he really is.Deviant or Saint? Zel always knew what she wanted and one of those things was to forget, but when pieces of her past start to resurface she'll have to walk through fire and get burned again.Asher hates her. Zel wants him.Someone wants them dead.Tables turn, bridges burn and sacrifices will be made.Warning: Extreme violence, graphic sex, incest, rape, filthy Jamaican language and an overly aggressive and possessive heroine 18+
author: Shantaye Brown
